des:
Connect Alexa to Aiera devices easily:

1. Download 'Aiera' app for Android or iOS.
2. Register account in 'Aiera' app;
3. Configure your device on the 'Aiera' app and name your device as it will be used in "Aiera" skill - bedroom light, geyser plug, Smart Doorbell etc.
4. Configure your account on Alexa app and search for 'Aiera' skill.
5. Click 'Enable Skill' of 'Aiera", and you'll be navigated to Aiera login page;
6. Follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
7. Setup has been completed.

You can enjoy the voice control on your Aiera devices:
“Alexa, turn on kitchen light"
“Alexa, turn off kitchen light"
“Alexa, dim bedroom light"
“Alexa, brighten bedroom light"
“Alexa, set the living room light to 20 percent"
“Alexa, set bedroom light to Blue"
“Alexa, turn on bedroom air conditioner"

If case you face any problem, please email us at support@ai-era.in
